message.body: Just paid you for company stuff and wages. Still owe you the $5861 for taxes. Also, do you want a 4 day fence job at $30/hr with Adam? Similar to your fence. Versek's might not start for another few weeks if we can't get materials deposit.
I would rather just have the time off til versek's starts. I definitely don't want to do it this week, but maybe next week if u don't want to do it or can't find someone else
It wouldn't be til next week or the week after if you wanted. The only other person is want to do it is James and he can't for months.
I'll do it if I can see it first. I gotta work around my security door installation and I am not sure when the door will be done being fabricated. Also I can't work on Mondays

Ok. It can be next tues-fri, or the following tues-fri. Still waiting for the ok from them too so it's not a go just yet. You can go by anytime and look -its Marcie's place. It's an 8' fence along the north and east wall and a gate.
